GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves up an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves up a user associated with the given username

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, ordered by creation date by default. The user can choose the sorting method and order. The order is descending, alphabetical A-Z, newest-oldest by default. The topic query filters articles by specified topic. The response will be paginated, allowing user to limit responses on page and select page number. Also returns number of responses.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article with the specified id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments from the specified article id. Able to be limited and paginated

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: allows client to post comment to an article and returns posted comment

POST /api/topics.description: allows client to post a new topic

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: allows client to patch article information

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: allows for a comment to be upvoted or downvoted

exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: allows client to delete a comment

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id.description: allows client to delete an article, deleting all comments associated with it
